title: Mother Tongue - centeral concept in the passage

content.question: A central concept in the passage is the notion that

choices.label: English has been enriched by borrowing from other languages
speakers use different forms of language for different purposes
creative writers should first master the standard form of their native language
literary conventions must often be sacrificed for elegance of expression

content.answer: speakers use different forms of language for different purposes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
